And comfortable! Soft and fits really well. Great colors.
The fiber and look is ok, just runs a full size small
The yarn looks painted and the size is not true to the size chart. It is very small.

I ordered four of these sweaters.  I gave ALL FOUR away.  They don't fit properly, and I didn't receive the ones that I ordered.  They run much much smaller than you think.  I will never purchase again.

Perfect for cold days and design is a riot received many compliments from friends
The pictured sweater looks fuzzy with long sleeves.  The sweater I received is cotton based with 3/4 sleeves.  The color is not the same.  Not good.

The sweater is absolutely beautiful. However, I normally wear a large but I ordered an xl because I like big sweaters in the winter and I’m also 5 foot 10. The sleeves are about 6 inches too short! 😂 Three quarter sleeves at best. Luckily my mom is only 5 foot 3 and she will love the sweater so I’m gifting it to her. If you are on the taller side I don’t know that I would even upsize a few sizes because the sleeves are that short. I can’t imagine they’d be much longer even if you go up three sizes.
Small for a large, color different than photo

评论概述: Excellent sweater! Great fit and color!
评论详情: Looked just like the picture. Soft and fits nice!
It’s soft and the colors are true to the picture. The sleeves are very short and barely reach my wrists.
Arms too short. Seller refused to send return mailing label. This is a scam.

评论概述: It is very baggy and fabric is uncomfortable.
评论详情: It is very baggy and fabric is uncomfortable

Product does not look the same as pictures online. It does not have long sleeves or a long fit. Very boxy. I wear a large and this was almost too small to wear. I was not happy with the sweater at all. Disappointed as it was a birthday gift from my son.
Looks like wool or blended but this is a cute but cotton, soon to lose its shape material. Love the color n image but deceptive

My son bought me this for a gift. It is nothing like the picture. Not fuzzy, not slouchy. Not comfy cozy like it looks. The stitching is rough and clunky. Reminds me of a sweater a beginning knitter might make.  The details are awful. The design looks like some sort of bull rather than a wolf. The collar is completely different--all white and really large. The colors aren't heathered or muted--it is one color for the bulk of the sweater and it is a light blue that is not attractive to me. So disappointed.
This run at least 2 sizes too small. Don’t bother ordering larger sizes because they seem to stop at Large even though 1/2/3X are offered.

I absolutely love this sweater. I bought it for Christmas get-togethers and got a lot of compliments. The color is really an unusual green. It doesn’t look exactly like the picture, but it is still a very pretty color. It’s comfortable and it’s cute as can be. The neck line looks a little stretched out. I wish it was a little tighter, but I can live with that. I like it and it fits true to size.

Neckline is perfectly snug and the sweater falls right at my waist. It fits perfectly so I won’t be washing on warm or drying at all (size L). You can see a line of stitching above and below the sheep design but I don’t feel like it takes away at all. The background color and design are quite complimentary.

The material is very cheap looking and the sleeves are so short I had to come back to see if what I ordered was supposed to have 3/4 length sleeves.  Nope.  They are full length in the photos descriptions.  Very oddly made and disappointing sweater

Poor quality, weird stitching around the middle all the way around the sweater. Also the sleeves are at best 3/4 sleeves, no where near being long sleeves. Very disappointed, looks nothing like the picture :(

I ordered a size 2 xl. And usually shirts and sweaters are loose on me. This sweater is pretty but it runs 2 sizes smaller than any other one. So the seater is really a large not a 2xl. Beware they run really small. It is pretty though but giving it away

After reading the reviews I was concerned about: 1st - whether I'll receive it, 2d - if I do what quality it will be. I did receive it (on Jan 6) before the promised date (Jan 10th), despite the strange notifications since Dec 30th, that "it is out for delivery". The quality also pleased me: it is thick warm wool like sweater and the pattern knitted pretty neatly, the only down side: instead of the very dark red color in the pattern there is orange. I still like it - good,  hand knitted feel. The boat neck could be also a little bit tighter, but it's my personal preference.
Weird and way too small. I know what size I wear. This is at least two sizes too small.
Fits very tightly, I sized up from my usual size and even still it was very tight

评论概述: Disappointed in Sweater Quality and Very Difficult to Return
评论详情: Sweater is poor quality and runs small. I am trying to return it and it is not easy like other Amazon purchases. Asked for a return label. What they sent was a bar code that is to be put in the package. No return label was sent, so there is no address and no way to send it back. I have reached out to the company several times and have not received a response. If you don’t want to be stuck with a product that doesn’t work out, don’t order from this store.

评论概述: Item Not as Pictured & Return process is questionable
评论详情: Color of sweater in photo was more of a grayish with red and blue tones but when it arrived it was tan with orange. Material is not a soft and fuzzy as pictured and is a cheaper quality. Return process is a mess. I attempted to process return through Amazon and I received what I thought was a return label and instructions but when I took it to USPS to return I was told the bar code on the printed label was invalid. Amazon should remove this seller!
could not get return label no matter how hard I tried

I felt I did not meet description.Sizing ran small, pattern was not as photo appeared and it has a significant seem line thru the middle of the sweater. It also arrived several days later then expected.I would not recommend.
This sweater runs VERY small.  I normally wear an XL, but my husband purchased a 2XL.  When it arrived it was the actually size of a medium.  Trying to return is a nightmare.
fabulous style....fabulous price...bought three for Christmas presents.  ordered a medium...I am size 10/12...liked the fit  lightweight but perfect as a finishing touch to an outfit
Beautiful sweater - clever design - well made. Highly recommend seller +++++

Wanted to love this but yikes! I sized up to a large for a looser fit, but the L fits very snug and the sleeves/arms are way too short. They hit about two full inches above my wrist. The sheep are done on some kind of weird panel-like thing and you see weird weaving marks above it. Returning but would love to find this sweater somewhere else in better quality!

评论概述: Not Even close to Description, Need a return mailing label.
评论详情: I was very dissatisfied with the quality of the sweater. There was a snag line all around the entire sweater. I started the return a few weeks ago and am yet to receive a return mailing label for the sweater. All I have received is the return label from amazon but not the shipping label. The status of the return still states that the seller will send a return mailing label within 5 days and it has been substantially longer than 5 days. I'm going to be disappointed if I'm charged again for this sweater because I don't have an address to return it to.
Ordered a 5XL based on other reviews that it ran small. What I received is comparable to an adult Large.

I purchased a small and a medium size. They were exactly the same size and run small. t 5-7, 137 I needed to have ordered a large or X-Large.  The jumper sweater is very cute and fun. Wear a white Tshirt under it for a cute contrast and pair of jean shorts or jeans.
Sweater is soft and well made. I ordered an XL for an oversized fit but it’s more like a M.
There is absolutely nothing I did not like excepting that I now wish I had ordered another

nice retro sweater--not scratchy

评论概述: Size and color don't match product description
评论详情: Color and sizing are off. Said lage would be my best size, but even though I like large sweaters, this was way too big. Color shown in picture ( rainbow) did not match what I received. Too difficult to return, so I kept it.
Product not as it looked on line. Neck was very small.  Seller did not respond to my request to return.  I would not order again

The color was not anywhere close to the color shown in the sales picture. The sleeves are much shorter than shown. The fabric is not fuzzy and warm like shown in the picture. The neckline is pulled and cheap. Save yourself the return headache, and don’t buy these products
This sweater fits great but the sleeves are short but not short enough to be 3/4 sleeve. This product came from China sooner than the original expected date.
I was pleasantly surprised after some reviews had me thinking it might run small. True to size for me. Nice color. Not scratchy.

The image shows a more mutable toned sweater, mine has no white in it and looks like the red stripe may have bled into it. Fit was off, image like it hits at the hips but it stops at the waist. Very snug and not relaxed as image implied, and was expecting it to be softer feel (looks fuzzy in image, it is not).  That being said, it appears well made (stitching) even though it's not quite what I was expecting to receive. I will give this to somebody else to wear who fits it better.
Runs really small.

I like my sweaters a bit oversized.  I ordered 5x.  It runs the size of a L or XL.  I loved the look of this cute sweater online and compared to stores with a 5x  they are usually huge.  This one I didn’t even try on it looks so small.  Then I have to wait for seller to mail me a packing label.  So I can’t even send back right away though I have a printer and could just print it.  They do not share the return address to send on my own which is dumb.  I’m very bummed out about this whole situation since I loved the design so much.

I wish I had read the reviews before ordering because like others who ordered the green and blue tree sweater, I too got a yellow and pale blue sweater. :( I’m bummed because I liked the green and blue design. Also, the sleeves are bit short for my arms, it’s tight in the armpit area and it’s boxy in the torso.
This is nothing like the colors in the Amazon picture. Bold, dark colors in a nice factory knit. Loose rolled collar. Boxy fit.
I ordered this sweater a size 3X so it would be loose and comfy . It looks like a child’s sweater! There is no way it will fit anyone I know. Very, very disappointed.

Fits super soft very cool design

This sweater is very cute and is also a nice thickness so it is warm. However the quality is poor and when I put it on the back of the neck immediately ripped. Because my hair covers that part up I will be able to repair it and it wont show so its not worth the trouble of returning. This isn’t a prime item so the shipping time was weeks. The size does run a bit small but the sweater is not short or cropped, I just mean its not baggy or oversized.
The collar is misshaped, not the same color green as the picture. Even the yarn it was knitted with is different from the picture.

Looks so cute in the photo, but it runs small, and the cuff at the sleeve is an odd color. I am trying to return it and have been waiting for the seller to send instructions. It is not a normal return process. I am crossing my fingers that the seller will send me instructions soon.

The coloring is painted on the fabric, the neckline is very wide, like an exaggerated boatneck collar.  It is not soft.  THe colors are not as pretty as the online picture, a pretty drab blue. Listen to the other bad reviews on this. Colors were way off and the cut is not a wide boat neck. It doesn’t get 1 star from me because it’s actually fairly well made and Amazon helped me out with the refund. Don’t waste your time going through the company for a return. It won’t happen.
Color and texture Casual dress

Ordering clothes on Amazon is always a gamble. You win some and you lose some. This one is not a winner. The color is not ash green and forest green as depicted in the image. The color reminds me of Mario's green transportation pipe and brownish green lentil soup. The colors don't compliment each other and the pattern is very pixely and weird. From a distance it looks more like mud dripping off a bright green shirt. The fabric thickness was also lacking to the point it was see through and shouldn't be worn for warmth. The length was also very short and for a size XL, it was more like a child's size large. This one is a major pass for me. I will be returning this sweater.
Very cheaply made not flattering
Item was ok. Took a long time to get here. Came from China.

Beautiful, colors are better than I thought they would be because of the reviews. Very soft. I did size up which is fine, don’t really like tight sweaters.

Shipped faster than expected overall quality very good but colors were not as pictured
Sleeves too short and price changes on re-order. Plus I think I will have to pay postage for return.

I bought a 3X even though I normally wear an XL because of the reviews that say it runs small. The sweater is like a 2X in the body but arms are freakishly small—skinny and short. Also, the mushrooms looked red when I ordered it, but in real life they are very orange. Very disappointed, and I was so excited to get this sweater.

评论概述: Not at all like the picture
评论详情: No tag so can’t tell front of sweater from the back and it doesn’t look at all like the sweater the model is wearing.

评论概述: Buyer beware…..not the same as in photo.
评论详情: So….im not sure im going to keep this sweater or not.1.  The ONLY similarities to the photo in Amazon are the color & the sheep.  Otherwise it’s pretty different.2.  I typically wear XL but because I’ve been burned by online clothing purchases before, I opted to get a 2xl this time.  This sweater is NOT a 2xl.3. I don’t have gorilla arms and these sleeves end right at my wrist, unlike those pictured on the model.4.  As others have reported, there is a strange panel on which the sheep design sit.  I’m not sure what that’s all about.  I feel like it accentuates my boobs & not in a good way.  lol.5.  And last but not least, the sweater in the picture looks fuzzy- like angora type yarn.  This sweater is definitely NOT the same.  However, at this price, that’s to be expected.  If I keep the sweater, I might have my mom use fuzzy yarn to knit over the sheep so they are more two dimensional.So overall, I’m very disappointed by the overall sweater.  I’d LOVE to know where I can buy the actual one in the photo.

评论概述: Company won’t send address for return SCAM!!
评论详情: This sweater is much smaller than expected and after initiating the return process, the system indicated that I would receive a return address from the company. I have been waiting for WEEKS!
Picture absolutely does not reflect the very poor quality of this sweater.  Cute design but absolute garbage.

Well. I took a chance and lost. The neck is really tight, not a wide boatneck like the picture shows. The colors, like a lot of the reviews say, are anything but true to the advertised photos. What looks like a nice burgundy, is fire engine red. What looks like a muted turquoise, is actually a neon blue, and what looks like soft green in the advertisement photo is actually a very baby pooish yellow color. None of these colors compliment each other on the actual sweater and if a person were to wear it, I think they’d get a headache after a few hours, or probably give someone else one. It’s ok though, my teddy bear footrest has a new ugly Christmas sweater now, so at least it’s not a total loss. I did give it 2 stars though, because even though it’s ugly, it is super soft, and if my eyesight left me I would find it super cozy and probably wear it often.
Order 2 sizes larger than you need if you want a good fit.

评论概述: It arrived before Christmas, so pleased,
评论详情: Love this sweater, hope it washes ok .

The sweater was cute but too short. Set up a return, received the code to put inside the package, and the instructions said the seller would email the return label in 3 days. It has been 10 days and no return label. There will be no credit for the sweater until the product is returned.
Love it! It's heavier for cold weather!! Sorry no Pic as it's already wrapped and under the tree!

评论概述: Does not match the picture at all
评论详情: So far off of the actual picture. Missing so many colors. Pretty disappointing…

The picture leads you to believe that the sweater colors are two tone green, with the bottom color being a forest dark green.  However the tree color actually is brown.  It does not look as attractive with the brown trees.

Amazon!! You should be ashamed to sell this sweater! Let’s stick to the positive. The design is very Christmasy, very festive without being over- the -top-Santa. Positivity stops there. The sweater is very thin and fragile, the material is cheap and wilty, and the sizing is small and boxy. I wouldn't wear this to sweep the barn. Do better if you want my business.
